თიხ-ის თასი: genitive case indicates possession i.e. noun pairs - the first noun modifies the second (e.g., clay pot) shown as -ის, or ს.
ეგ: this /that (refers to an object or person that is closer to the second person than to the speaker)
ეგენი: these/those (refers to an object or person that is closer to the second person than to the speaker)
მანდ: third demonstrative adverb of place which falls between the traditional “here” and “there”
